sourcesContent:
FrontEnd
import { Component, ElementRef, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuItem } from 'primeng/api'; import { LayoutService } from "./service/app.layout.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-topbar', templateUrl: './app.topbar.component.html' }) export class AppTopBarComponent { items!: MenuItem[]; @ViewChild('menubutton') menuButton!: ElementRef; @ViewChild('topbarmenubutton') topbarMenuButton!: ElementRef; @ViewChild('topbarmenu') menu!: ElementRef; constructor(public layoutService: LayoutService) { } }
